sequences::markdown_card_8::text:
## Igice vy’ikiganiro  
Ibiganiro bikorwa na ma clips arimwo abantu. Koresha amasanamu yo hagati na hagati canke amasanamu yegereye. Kwirikira ibintu ngendegwako zitangwa na Story Maker mujisho rya camera iyo mugize ama didane. Ikintu ca hafi canke ca kure gituma bigora kumva ikiganiro, canke kutangura imigenderanire hagati yawa muntu nabandi bantu.
sequences::quiz_card_5::question: Nivyo canke sivyo: Ukongerako ama sanamu abafasha kwerekana ingene igikorwa cakozwe, nivyagiye birahinduka kumwanya kumwanya.
sequences::markdown_card_12::text:
## Ntimwibagire  
Urukurikirane rwa ma plan/ contrechamp bifasha kwerekana igikorwa kibandanya mwisanamu zawe. Urukurikirane rwuduce tw’amasanamu/na contrechamp nuburyo bwiza kugira uronke ama sanamu meza. Urukurikirane rwiza  rwishura ibibazo bitandatu bihambaye twamaze kudondagura( ni nde, niki, nihehe, ryari, kuberiki urwo rubanza). Ugukora urukurikirane rwiza bisigura gufata amasanamu kumpande zitandukanye za ma plan, zirimwo ibice vyiyongerako munkuru. Mushize hamwe urukurikirane rwinshi,bituma inkuru itumvikana.
sequences::markdown_card_5::text: Naho inkuru yawe yoba igoye, ntiwibagire gufata amasanamu mumice itatu : intango, ivyohagati, nimpera. Igice cose gishobora kugira urukurikirane , hamwe n’ibintu bitandukanye muri cadre. Muri rusangi, les plans zitegerezwa guhuza n’urukurikirane rumwe rugizwe na vyabice bitatu. Munkuru zimwe zimwe mushobora kuba mufise ibibanza bifise ama plans atanu (canke arenga) kugice cose c’inkuru.
sequences::quiz_card_1::question: N’igiki kigize urutonde rwama plan?
sequences::title: Sequences
sequences::markdown_card_11::text: Ntuhindukize canke ngo uhindure ikibanza ca camera iyo uwo muntu uriko urafata ariko aganira nabo hanze yikibanza uriko umufatiramwo. Inyuma yaho uwo muntu uriko urafata ahejeje kwishura kubibazo kuri camera, fata isanamu yigikorwa camera yaritumberejeko.
sequences::preview_card_4::header: Nkurukurikirane rwarwa ma plan atatu murutonde rutanga inkuru isanzwe, mugabo rukwiye.
sequences::markdown_card_3::text: Kumenya inkuru yawe biguha ubwigenge mu gufata ama foto yawe murutonde urwari rwo rwose. Mu mpera mutegerezwa kuvyegeranya kugira mushikirize inkuru yanyu.
sequences::quiz_card_3::choices[0]::text: Nivyo, berekana gusa ivyo uyo muntu  ariko araraba.
sequences::markdown_card_2::text:
## Ishingiro rugufata urulurikirane rwama sanamu  
Kugira mutegure urukurikirane mutegerezwa gucagagura ikintu cose co munkuru yawe. Bishobora kuba ari igitigiri gitoc’uduce, canke twinshi. Mutegerezwa kumenya ibice vyose imbere yo gufatanya urukurikirane rwose.  
Raba kano karorero. Umuhinga ashaka gukora inkuru kukibanza c’ivyamwa bizwi. Bashaka kwerekana igice umuntu ariko agura ivyamwa.
sequences::quiz_card_3::question: Nivyo canke sivyo: Urukurikirane rwikibanza/ ahatandukanye n’ikibanza vyonyene bishobora kwerekana ico uwo muntu ariko araraba.
sequences::markdown_card_0::text:
## Muriki cigwa muzokwiga  
• Ingene wubaka clips yamasanamu kugira ukore urukurikirane.  
• Ingene ukiresha ubuhinga butandukanye urukurikirane rw’igikorwa.  
• Ingene urukurikirane ruterimbere rwongereza inguvu zinkuru yawe.
sequences::markdown_card_4::text: Izo mpande nintango, hagati, niherezoyinkuru yawe. Hariho umuntu, hariho, ikimanyu c’icamwa, uwo muntu ariko arariha ivyamwa. Ninkuru isanzwe mugabo ikora. Murashobora kwongerako ikiganiro numudandaza  canke umuguzi wivyamwa. Mushobora no gushiramwo uruhande rurerure kugira musigure ikibanza.
sequences::quiz_card_5::choices[0]::text: Nivyo, plan yose ishobora kwerekana uruhande rutandukanye mugufata.
sequences::quiz_card_5::choices[1]::text: Sivyo, kwoongerako ama  plan bitera ama didane mubantu gusa.
sequences::markdown_card_6::text: Ubuhinga bumyenyerewe gukoreshwa iyo utazi inkuru muriko muravuga, nugutangura na ma plan ya kure, tangura gufata ku ma plan akurikirana. Muriko muregaranya ama foto yanyu murutonde, bitoztanga urutonde kama. Mukoresheje ama plan atanu yintango: yagutse, maremare, abayabaye, yegeranye. Insiguro , muzoshobora gukora urukurikirane rukwiye.
sequences::markdown_card_9::text: Muhitemwo cadre mugumye iyo. Mumaze guhitamwo uruhande rwa cadre uwo mufata ahagararamwo, mugumizeho, gumizaho gushika uwo ufata ahejeje kwishuraikibazo. Hindura gusa ibigize cadre hagati y’ibibazo.
sequences::markdown_card_1::text: Urutonde rwa ma plan n’urukurikiranerwa mafoto. Ikozwe na ma plan ahigikiranye, urukurikirane rumwe rwama foto rurashobora gusigura inkuru yose. Storymaker yitaho gukoresha ama plan meshi ngo ikore urukurikirane rukwiye.
sequences::preview_card_0::header: Nigute nkora urukurikirane mu ma sanamu?
sequences::markdown_card_7::text:
## Urukurikirane mukibanza n’inyuma yikibanza  
![](7.png)  
Mushaka kwerekana igikorwa mupande zitandukanye mumwanya umwe, mutegerezwa gufata mubihe bitandukanye. Birazwi murukurikirane mufata mubibanza ninyuma y’ibibanza. Mugukora urukwirikirane mukibanza ninyuma y’ikibanza , fata impande zibiri mumwanya umwe. Dufate ako karorero ahou mu hinga akora cinema afashe umuntu mukibanza ninyuma yikibanza ariko arndika kumashini.
sequences::quiz_card_4::question: Nizihe plan zishoboka kuri plan y’ikibanza n’inyuma y’ikibanza?
sequences::preview_card_3::header: Tuzokenera kubona umuntu ariko arariha ivyamwa.
sequences::quiz_card_3::choices[1]::text: Sivyo, bashobora kwerekana ico uwo muntu ufata ariko ariko arakora.
sequences::quiz_card_2::question: Nikihe gitigiri gito ca ma plan mugukora plan y’ikibanza umufatiramwo, ninyuma y’ikibanza?
sequences::markdown_card_10::text: Gumya ikibanza ciza c’imbere. Mutabizi neza, mumenye, raba cadrage mucirwa ca ma plan.
